comments.author: Pat Cavit.9234
comments.body: Y’all are great fun to chat with, it’s our pleasure.

comments.author: Reincarnated.1754
comments.body:
I would like to say Thank You too.
You guys do a great job.

comments.author: DanScott.4839
comments.body: The API section of the forum seems to be far more active from a developer point of view, and it’s nice to have such a close relationship and community with developers of the game we love to play and make applications for so I am going to say +1 to this thread, thank you API developers <3

comments.author: Valento.9852
comments.body: You guys are amazing! Can’t thank enough for your work and effort and care. Thank you! Thank you! Thank you!

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: Thank you developers who make it all worthwhile <3

comments.author: Chokapik.3741
comments.body: Yeah, I think they don’t get enough credit for what they do

comments.author: Torsailr.8456
comments.body:
Lawton and Pat and all the others I don’t know about.

It occured to me today that all of you put in an immense amount of work on the APIs (and even more work talking to us about it) and I’m not sure we stop to thank you for it enough. So…

Thank you.
